sourcesContent:
const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({
    parentContainer: {
      position: "relative",
      display: "flex",
      alignItems: "center",
      justifyContent: "center",
      height: "100vh", // Ensure full screen height
      width: "100vw", // Ensure full screen width
      backgroundColor: "rgba(0,0,0,0.1)", // Light background for debugging
    },
    carContainer: {
      position: "absolute",
      top: 0,
      left: 0,
      width: "100%",
      height: "30%",
      overflow: "hidden",
      zIndex: 1,
    },
    car: {
      position: "absolute",
      left: "-500px",
      top: "50%",
      transform: "translateY(-50%)",
      width: "600px",
      height: "auto",
      animation: "$drive 10s linear infinite",
    },
    orderDetails: {
      position: "absolute",
      top: "50%",
      left: "50%",
      transform: "translate(-50%, -50%)",
      backgroundColor: "#ffffff",
      color: "#333",
      padding: theme.spacing(5),
      borderRadius: theme.spacing(2),
      boxShadow: "0 4px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)",
      zIndex: 2,
      width: "100%", // Confirm 100% width
      height: "70%", // Confirm 70% height
      textAlign: "center",
      fontSize: "1.25rem",
      overflowY: "auto", // Scroll if content overflows
    },
    "@keyframes drive": {
      "0%": { left: "-500px" },
      "100%": { left: "calc(100% + 500px)" },
    },
  }));

export default useStyles;
